title: Emerald Slice Kundan Stud: Green Goddess
features: Features a unique trillion-cut Emerald slice as the centerpiece, haloed by dazzling Kundan Polki diamonds. The gold setting has a delicate, hand-applied Hyderabadi polish, giving it a rich luster and protecting the gold. Classic stud design with modern twist.
occasions: or as a thoughtful gift for someone special. Also suitable for traditional occasions like Haldi ceremonies or small family gatherings
adding a touch of elegance and tradition to your ensemble.
description: This Emerald slice Kundan stud seamlessly blends tradition with modern aesthetics. The rare triangle-cut Emerald makes this a unique conversation starter. Handcrafted with meticulous detail using Hyderabadi techniques ensures lasting quality and a touch of regional heritage.
